entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Peace River

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
